programme.title: Sonic X
programme.desc: As Chris spends his last day with Sonic while they prepare for their trip home, the President's army colonel decides to act on his own to capture Dr. Eggman.

programme.title: Sonic X
programme.desc: Chris is unable to come to terms with the idea of parting with Sonic and decides to run away with Sonic. As the time runs short for Chaos Control to send Sonic back to his world before the two worlds merge, Chris and Sonic say their good byes one last time.

programme.title: Sonic X
programme.desc: With everyone back in their home worlds the crisis has been averted, and all seems to be back to normal. Except, no one seems to know where Sonic is. His friends and even Eggman begin to wonder where he might be.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 [English Dub]
programme.sub-title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 -EP53 I Melt With You [English Dub]
programme.desc: Fantômas Mark III, grandson of the mysterious master thief and disguise artist Fantômas, who terrorized Europe during his heyday, is plotting to take over the world. He demands that Lupin deliver the world's largest ruby in exchange for Fujiko, whom he is holding captive.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 [English Dub]
programme.sub-title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 -EP54 Mercy Mercy Me [English Dub]
programme.desc: The aging Inspector Hanshichi Mikawa, who failed to capture Lupin 10 years ago, is viewed as a nuisance by his peers at the downtown police station. Lupin has announced he'll be stealing the golden Goddess of Mercy statue.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 [English Dub]
programme.sub-title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 -EP55 Kooky Kabuki, Part One [English Dub]
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang have stolen the "36 Views of Mt. Fuji," a famous series of 46 woodblock prints, from the exhibition hall. However, a gang calling itself the Shiranami Five challenges Lupin head-on by stealing one of the prints from him.

programme.title: Sonic X
programme.desc: Sonic activates Chaos Control in his battle against Dark Oak, most formidable enemy he's faced thus far, to scatter the Emeralds across the galaxy. Meanwhile, Tails, Amy, and Cream encounter a spaceship that's crash-landed to their planet during a meteor shower.

programme.title: Sonic X
programme.desc: Grown up Chris returns to Sonic's world as his young twelve-year-old self, joining Sonic and his friends to stop Metarex from destroying their planet.

programme.title: Sonic X
programme.desc: As Sonic continues his journey aboard Blue Typhoon for the Chaos Emerald, they arrive on Planet Secco, a planet that's supposed to be bone dry and yet is now filled with water.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 [English Dub]
programme.sub-title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 -EP56 Kooky Kabuki, Part Two [English Dub]
programme.desc: Goemon, siding with the Shiranami Five, challenges Lupin to a one-on-one duel. While Goemon keeps Lupin busy, the Shiranami Five steals the 36 Views, but one of its members, Kikuko Benten, betrays her gang and escapes with the loot.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 [English Dub]
programme.sub-title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 -EP56 Kooky Kabuki, Part Two [English Dub]
programme.desc: Goemon, siding with the Shiranami Five, challenges Lupin to a one-on-one duel. While Goemon keeps Lupin busy, the Shiranami Five steals the 36 Views, but one of its members, Kikuko Benten, betrays her gang and escapes with the loot.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 [English Dub]
programme.sub-title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 -EP57 Alter-Ego Maniac [English Dub]
programme.desc: On a wild whim, Inspector Zenigata swipes a throwing coin owned by his great Edo-era ancestor, Heiji Zenigata while he's viewing the inside of an incredible new safe protected by Professor Hunter's supercomputer.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 [English Dub]
programme.sub-title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 -EP58 Getting' Jigen With It [English Dub]
programme.desc: Lupin and Jigen are after the Droplet of Aurora, a diamond adorning a prima ballerina's tiara. During the heist, Jigen is wounded and in a twist of fate, is saved by Monica, the prima ballerina.

programme.title: Sonic X
programme.desc: Sonic and his friends are the guests of honour at a feast for saving the planet. Dr. Eggman, observing the celebration, begins to plot his next scheme to steal away the Chaos Emerald.

programme.title: Sonic X
programme.desc: Continuing the search for Chaos Emeralds, Sonic, and soon after Dr. Eggman, heads for Planet Breezy but is faced with an attack from Metarex.

programme.title: Naruto the Movie: Ninja Clash in the Land of Snow [English Dubbing]
programme.desc: Naruto and his team are sent on a mission to guard Yukie Fujikaze, a popular actress starring in the hit movie "The Adventures of Princess Gale."

programme.title: BLEACH: THE MOVIE - Memories of Nobody [English Subtitle]
programme.desc: An evil clan is sending the World of the Living and the Soul Society on a collision course. Can Ichigo and his fellow Soul Reapers save the two worlds from annihilation?

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter: Phantom Rouge [English Dubbing]
programme.desc: Someone has stolen Kurapika's eyes! Gon and Killua investigate, but the Phantom Troupe is back!

programme.title: INUYASHIKI LAST HERO [English Subtitle]
programme.desc: Ichiro Inuyashiki is a boring office worker who looks like an old man. Even after building them a new home, his family is nothing but ungrateful. One day, Inuyashiki is diagnosed with terminal cancer. Out on a walk to clear his head, a UFO crashes into him, and his body is rebuilt into a deadly robot. - He steps in to stop a group of kids from torturing a homeless man when he is knocked unconscious.

programme.title: INUYASHIKI LAST HERO [English Subtitle]
programme.desc: Reborn a robot, Inuyashiki finds meaning by saving others. - Meanwhile, high school student Hiro Shishigami has also been reborn a robot. Shishigami has no regard for anybody aside from his best friend and his family, and uses his robot powers to kill indiscriminately. - Contrary to Inuyashiki, he feels alive when he is taking the lives of others. - What happens when these two meet?

programme.title: INUYASHIKI LAST HERO [English Subtitle]
programme.desc: Shishigami is rattled to see Inuyashiki stand up from a blow that should have killed him before flying away. Seeing that, Inuyashiki knows that Shishigami has a robot body just like himself. After this meeting, Inuyashiki studies his abilities, and uses them to save others. Meanwhile, Shishigami confronts a group of delinquents who have been tormenting his best friend Naoyuki Ando.

programme.title: Naruto the Movie: Legend of the Stone of Gelel
programme.desc: Drawn into a fierce struggle over the legendary Stone of Gelel, Naruto, Shikamaru, and Sakura must keep the stone from falling into the wrong hands.

programme.title: BLEACH: The Movie 2 - The DiamondDust Rebellion [English Dubbing]
programme.desc: After the treasured Ouin is stolen, Toshiro Hitsugaya disappears and becomes suspected of treason.

programme.title: BLEACH the Movie 3: Fade to Black [English Dubbing]
programme.desc: Ichigo must fight a lonely battle to save Rukia before the two are forced to part ways forever!

programme.title: INUYASHIKI LAST HERO [English Subtitle]
programme.desc: Ichiro Inuyashiki is a boring office worker who looks like an old man. Even after building them a new home, his family is nothing but ungrateful. One day, Inuyashiki is diagnosed with terminal cancer. Out on a walk to clear his head, a UFO crashes into him, and his body is rebuilt into a deadly robot. - He steps in to stop a group of kids from torturing a homeless man when he is knocked unconscious.

programme.title: INUYASHIKI LAST HERO [English Subtitle]
programme.desc: Reborn a robot, Inuyashiki finds meaning by saving others. - Meanwhile, high school student Hiro Shishigami has also been reborn a robot. Shishigami has no regard for anybody aside from his best friend and his family, and uses his robot powers to kill indiscriminately. - Contrary to Inuyashiki, he feels alive when he is taking the lives of others. - What happens when these two meet?

programme.title: INUYASHIKI LAST HERO [English Subtitle]
programme.desc: Shishigami is rattled to see Inuyashiki stand up from a blow that should have killed him before flying away. Seeing that, Inuyashiki knows that Shishigami has a robot body just like himself. After this meeting, Inuyashiki studies his abilities, and uses them to save others. Meanwhile, Shishigami confronts a group of delinquents who have been tormenting his best friend Naoyuki Ando.

programme.title: Naruto the Movie: Ninja Clash in the Land of Snow [English Dubbing]
programme.desc: Naruto and his team are sent on a mission to guard Yukie Fujikaze, a popular actress starring in the hit movie "The Adventures of Princess Gale."

programme.title: BLEACH: THE MOVIE - Memories of Nobody [English Subtitle]
programme.desc: An evil clan is sending the World of the Living and the Soul Society on a collision course. Can Ichigo and his fellow Soul Reapers save the two worlds from annihilation?

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 [English Dub]
programme.sub-title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 -EP50 The Second Time Around, Part One [English Dub]
programme.desc: An illicit auction selling smuggled treasures is taking place. Lupin targets the auction, but is outsmarted by Fujiko, who takes the auction items for herself, as she usually does. In the process, Lupin discovers the auctioneer is Cornelia, the woman he once loved who died saving his life. Has Cornelia really risen from her grave and if so, why?

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 [English Dub]
programme.sub-title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 -EP51 The Second Time Around, Part Two [English Dub]
programme.desc: Lupin is reunited with Cornelia, a woman who died by her father's hands to save Lupin's life. However, Cornelia's memories of Lupin have been erased. Her father is Dr. Zel, a Nazi who has succeeded in resurrecting corpses and controlling them. Cornelia is caught between the lies her father tells her and her memories of love for Lupin. Will Lupin be able to save Cornelia?

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 [English Dub]
programme.sub-title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 -EP52 Emmanuelle in Bangkok [English Dub]
programme.desc: Fujiko discovers that the Holy Scripture for Immortality is hidden within the jungles of Thailand. However, Emmanuelle Poirot, a cold-hearted beauty, is after them too. Lupin, love-struck and being manipulated by Emmanuelle, goes to the temple where the Holy Scripture is hidden and takes on the challenge of stealing it. Stuck between two beauties, whom will Lupin get the treasure for?

programme.title: Sonic X
programme.desc: As Chris spends his last day with Sonic while they prepare for their trip home, the President's army colonel decides to act on his own to capture Dr. Eggman.
